arts.ttl: Rennes predicted XI v Montpellier: Jota could make debut from the bench
arts.sum: Whilst Jota isn’t expected to be included from the start against Montpellier HSC, the Portuguese winger could make his Stade Rennais debut on Sunday afternoon. The former Celtic winger was…

arts.ttl: Jota doesn't hold same Celtic expectations for Rennes spell as stark admission made
arts.sum: Jota has admitted he doesn't have the same expectations for his time at Rennes as he did at Celtic. Get the latest news sent straight to your messages by joining our Celtic WhatsApp community today.

arts.ttl: Jota bares all with Celtic confession and surprising Saudi stance as Rennes reveal cunning trick used to land winger
arts.sum: The wide man is set to make his first appearance in Ligue 1 this weekend

arts.ttl: ‘I don’t regret at all going to Saudi Arabia’ – Rennes’ Jota opens up on Al-Ittihad spell
arts.sum: Rennes winger Jota (25) has been unveiled to the media this Friday during a press conference transcribed by Ouest-France. The Portuguese winger is arguably Rennes’ marquee signing of the summer…

arts.ttl: Official | Lorenz Assignon extends Rennes deal
arts.sum: Rennes right-back Lorenz Assignon (24) has signed a contract extension with his formative club, the Ligue 1 side has announced. Assignon had been a key target for several clubs this…
